get.description: Gets information about all the Subscription Level ProfessionalService in a certain Azure subscription.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The Azure subscription ID. This is a GUID-formatted string (e.g. 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000)

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to be used with the HTTP request.

200.description: Request successful. The request returns the resulting ProfessionalService resources.

nextLink.description: the next link to query to get the remaining results.

termUnit.description: The unit term eg P1M,P1Y,P2Y,P3Y meaning month,1year,2year,3year respectively

startDate.description: The start date of the current term

endDate.description: The end date of the current term

billingPeriod.description: The billing period eg P1M,P1Y for monthly,yearly respectively

isFreeTrial.description: Whether the current term is a Free Trial term

paymentChannelType.description: The Payment channel for the ProfessionalServiceSubscription.

paymentChannelMetadata.description: The metadata about the ProfessionalService subscription such as the AzureSubscriptionId and ResourceUri.

created.description: The created date of this resource.

lastModified.description: The last modifier date if this resource.

autoRenew.description: Whether the ProfessionalService subscription will auto renew upon term end.

quoteId.description: The quote id which the ProfessionalService will be purchase with.

storeFront.description: The store front which initiates the purchase.

termUnit.description: The unit term eg P1M,P1Y,P2Y,P3Y meaning month,1year,2year,3year respectively

billingPeriod.description: The billing period eg P1M,P1Y for monthly,yearly respectively
